#summary Compiling the Dev C++ Code
#labels Featured

= Introduction =

The JNI DLL of this project was built using [http://www.bloodshed.net/devcpp.html BloodShed Dev C++].


= Details =

1. Load the JIntellitype.dev project in [http://www.bloodshed.net/devcpp.html BloodShed Dev C++]

2. Don't forget you need to tell it where your Java JNI includes are by going into Project->Options in Dev C++.

http://www.melloware.com/images/devc-jni.jpg

3. Also don't forget to change Project->Options Build Options to send the output to directories you desire!
